description:
Welcome to the 8th Bristol Machine Learning Meetup!

IMPORTANT INFO:
This month we are going to try a different venue for our social: the Watershed cafe/bar in the centre of Bristol.

This is going to be a social event. So no speakers, just a chance to meet-up with like minded people and talk about all things ML/AI (or whatever you want to talk about..).

Hope to see you there!
title: Bristol Machine Learning #8 - Social One
